Constructor Detail

FileImageRecorder

public FileImageRecorder(File base_path,
                         int starting_seq,
                         String prefix,
                         RecordingSuccessCallback callback)
Creates image recorder. It will record files in given directory with names like IMAGE-0010.png

Parameters:
base_path - - directory where image files will be stored
starting_seq - - starting sequence number
prefix - - filename prefix
callback - - callback object which will be notified on each success/failure. Could be null.

activate

public void activate()
Active recorder. Next image will be saved, after which it will be automatically deactivated.

Active recorder.
